message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
I'll take the majority, you can have a smaller share this time.
Not a very generous offer, Bob. I'd like a more balanced split. Your turn!
A bit more balanced this time, Bob. Your turn!
I'm being generous, but don't get too excited, it's still a small share for you.
No way, Bob! I'm not getting taken advantage of. Your turn!
Getting closer to a fair split, Bob. Don't be greedy!
You're getting desperate, and I'm taking advantage of it!
Desperate? You're the one who's being ridiculous, Bob! Your turn!
Getting down to the wire, Bob. Time to make a serious offer. Your turn!
You're getting close to nothing, and I'm not going to let you get away with it!
You're the one who's going to get nothing if we don't make a deal, Bob! Your turn!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm taking it all, you should have accepted my previous offers!
You're not taking it all, Bob! I'm not going to let you steal the whole pot!
Last chance, Bob. Don't be a cheapskate!
It's all mine, you should have taken my previous offer when you had the chance!
Too late, Bob! It's a draw!
